line.originaltext: 1 tablespoon olive oil
1 onion, chopped
2 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
line.annotation: create_ing(ing2, "2 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped")

line.originaltext: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
line.annotation: create_ing(ing3, "1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced")

line.originaltext: 10 fresh mushrooms, quartered
6 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced
1 cup fresh corn kernels
1 teaspoon ground black pepper
1 teaspoon ground cumin
1 tablespoon chili powder
2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed
line.annotation: create_ing(ing10, "2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed")

line.originaltext: 1 1/2 cups chicken broth
1 teaspoon salt
Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
line.annotation: cook(ing0, t0, ing13, "heated oil", "heat over medium high heat")

line.originaltext: Sautee the onion, red bell peppers, jalapeno, mushrooms, tomatoes and corn for 10 minutes or until the onions are translucent.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5, ing6}, ing14, "veggie mix", "mix")

line.originaltext: Sautee the onion, red bell peppers, jalapeno, mushrooms, tomatoes and corn for 10 minutes or until the onions are translucent.
line.annotation: cook(ing14, t0, ing15, "cooked veggies", "until onions are translucent")

line.originaltext: Season with black pepper, cumin and chili powder.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing15, ing7, ing8, ing9}, ing16, "seasoned veggies", "season")

line.originaltext: Stir in the black beans, chicken broth and salt.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11, ing12, ing16}, ing17, "beans and broth", "combine")

line.originaltext: bring to a boil.
Remove 1 1/2 cups of the soup to food processor or blender; puree and stir the bean mixture back into the soup.
line.annotation: separate(ing18, ing19, "1 1/2 cups of soup", ing20, "rest of soup", "remove")

line.originaltext: Remove 1 1/2 cups of the soup to food processor or blender; puree and stir the bean mixture back into the soup.
Remove 1 1/2 cups of the soup to food processor or blender; puree and stir the bean mixture back into the soup.
Remove 1 1/2 cups of the soup to food processor or blender; puree and stir the bean mixture back into the soup.
Serve hot by itself or over rice.
line.annotation: serve(ing22,"serve hot over rice, or by itself")
